Procedure.name: Monitoring - Windows - Send Event Log Alert With Attitional Current User Info

Statement.description: Procedure description: Get Azure AD specific information from the registry. Kaseya customer value: Audit if the computer is Azure AD joined or not. End user value: Track non Azure AD joined computers for compliance. Dependencies: "UPSTREAM - Event Set - User Experience - Application Crashes/Hang". Usage: Associate this with "UPSTREAM - Event Set - User Experience - Application Crashes/Hang" to additionally extract the current user when triggering alarms. Report options: Agent Alert Log. Maintainer: powerpack@upstream.se ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Statement.name: SendEmail

Parameter.name: Body
Parameter.value:
This message indicates applicacion Crash or Application hang on a mchine. The following informaion is to be used for ticket creatin and troubleshooting.
Currently logged in user: #vAgentConfiguration.currentUser#
#body#

Procedure.name: Monitoring - Windows - Simulated Event Log Error

Statement.description: Procedure description: Use this as template for creating customer Event Logs for auditing and tracking. Kaseya customer value: To be used in combination with automation, auditing and tracking. End user value: Auditing and tracking. Dependencies: Windows OS. Usage: Schedule from Kaseya Policy Manager or Run Now. Report options: Windows Event Log. Look for " UPSTREAM: Simulated Event Log For Application Informational". Maintainer: powerpack@upstream.se ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Statement.name: Create Event Log Entry

Parameter.name: Parameter1
Parameter.value: UPSTREAM: Simulated Event Log For Application Informational
